raw_reviews.text: Had visited this beach many times before when I came to Goa. This time visited in the night it looked really good. The beach and shacks ate open full time. Nice to walk around, have some drinks and chill near the beach. Food is also good here. Place is lively even during midnight.
raw_reviews.author: Mark Stephen

raw_reviews.text: I recently visited Baga Beach in April. It was quite hot, but I still enjoyed walking around and taking a dip in the sea. It's a great place to hang out with friends, relax, and have fun. If you love parties and a lively atmosphere, Baga Beach is the perfect spot!

Beach is busy, but OK during daylight hours; but after dark is dreadful.
Each Bar/Cafe is blasting out terrible loud music, you can't hear anyone speak and the place is full of lots of groups of drunken Indian young men.
There is a Police presence there, but we still didn't feel safe and won't return.
